data.message: facebook you should give me money i lose all my time in facebook    😄   I wish you further development

replies.message: Facebook,I have to keep sending Hubby and my 51yr. old Son to Florida so they can play the Dogs just so I can have some F.B. time alone.tomorrow will be the second time since i have been on F.B.
Excuse me,this makes the 3rd. time I have sent them to Gamble and I have only been on F.B.for less than 3months.It does not take much to get the guys to go as long as I am paying for it.

Eddie my second born use to live in Datona Beach and every two weeks we would go there and this is when hubby took a liking to the dogs,That was over 20yrs. ago and I had to put a stop to hubby going some yrs. back as it was getting to deep in the wallet.
